member.summary: SortableOption 配置类

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.RootSelector
member.summary: 获得/设置 目标元素选择器

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Group
member.summary: or { name: "...", pull: [true, false, 'clone', array], put: [true, false, array] }

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Clone
member.summary: 获得/设置 拖动时是否克隆元素 默认 null 未设置 不克隆

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Putback
member.summary: 获得/设置 是否允许拖动回来 默认 null 未设置 允许

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Sort
member.summary: sorting inside list

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Delay
member.summary: time in milliseconds to define when the sorting should start

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.DelayOnTouchOnly
member.summary: only delay if user is using touch

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.TouchStartThreshold
member.summary: // px, how many pixels the point should move before cancelling a delayed drag event

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Disabled
member.summary: Disables the sortable if set to true.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Animation
member.summary: ms, animation speed moving items when sorting, `0` — without animation

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Easing
member.summary: Easing for animation. Defaults to null. See https://easings.net/ for examples.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Handle
member.summary: Drag handle selector within list items

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Filter
member.summary: Selectors that do not lead to dragging (String or Function)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.PreventOnFilter
member.summary: Call `event.preventDefault()` when triggered `filter`

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Draggable
member.summary: Specifies which items inside the element should be draggable

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.DataIdAttr
member.summary: HTML attribute that is used by the `toArray()` method

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.GhostClass
member.summary: Class name for the drop placeholder

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.ChosenClass
member.summary: Class name for the chosen item

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.DragClass
member.summary: Class name for the dragging item

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.SwapThreshold
member.summary: Threshold of the swap zone

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.InvertSwap
member.summary: Will always use inverted swap zone if set to true

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.InvertedSwapThreshold
member.summary: Threshold of the inverted swap zone (will be set to swapThreshold value by default)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Direction
member.summary: Direction of Sortable (will be detected automatically if not given)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.ForceFallback
member.summary: ignore the HTML5 DnD behaviour and force the fallback to kick in

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.FallbackClass
member.summary: Class name for the cloned DOM Element when using forceFallback

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.FallbackOnBody
member.summary: Appends the cloned DOM Element into the Document's Body

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.FallbackTolerance
member.summary: Specify in pixels how far the mouse should move before it's considered as a drag.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.DragoverBubble
member.summary: DragoverBubble

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.RemoveCloneOnHide
member.summary: Remove the clone element when it is not showing, rather than just hiding it

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.EmptyInsertThreshold
member.summary: px, distance mouse must be from empty sortable to insert drag element into it

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.MultiDrag
member.summary: 获得/设置 是否允许多拖动 默认 null 未设置

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.SortableOption.Swap
member.summary: 获得/设置 是否交换拖动 默认 null 未设置

member.summary: 获得/设置 是否交换拖动项样式名称 默认 null 未设置
